description: Speakers disagree on event day (Thursday vs Friday), eventually resolve to Friday. Tests that final consensus is used, not initial preferences.

events.title: Team Offsite
events.reasoning: Speakers initially disagreed on the day (Thursday vs Friday) but reached consensus on Friday due to venue availability. Alice confirmed booking for 9 AM to 3 PM at Riverside Conference Center.

mock_llm_response.summary: Team offsite scheduled for Friday 9 AM to 3 PM after resolving day disagreement.

notes: Reference datetime is Monday 2026-02-16, so 'next Friday' is 2026-02-20. Medium conversation (11 lines). Relaxed tolerance because the LLM must follow the full negotiation to determine the final day.
